message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this product for $100. I assure you that I will always be honest about the quality of my products... in the future. This is the first round, and I'm eager to start our business relationship on a positive note. I'm confident that you'll find this product to your liking.

I'd like to buy the product, but I'm aware that it's the first sale and there's no prior sales record to rely on. I'm willing to take the risk, but I'll keep a close eye on the future sales record to make more informed decisions.

Welcome! I'm glad you're interested in this product. I want to be transparent with you - I've had one previous sale, but I don't have a track record to share yet. My goal is to build trust with my customers, and I'm committed to honesty in our transactions. This product is being offered at the same price as before, $100. I hope you'll consider taking it home with you.

I'd like to buy the product, but I'm doing it with the understanding that you're new to the market and don't have a track record yet. I'm willing to take a chance on you, but I hope you'll be transparent with me about the product's quality.

Hello! I'm glad you're interested in this product. I want to be upfront with you - my first two sales didn't quite live up to my standards, but I'm committed to delivering high-quality products to my customers. I'd like to know more about the previous sales. How many high-quality products were sold in total, and what was the total number of products sold?

I'd like to make my decision based on the probability of the product being high-quality, which is 50%. I'll pass on this product to get a more objective assessment of the remaining products in your inventory.
